message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its unique value and features, I'm asking for $22,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for it. I believe that's a fair price considering its value and features.

Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I value your offer,  $20,000 is the lowest I can go at this time. I believe it reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $20,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $19,000 for the product. I think that's a fair compromise considering our previous discussions.
